text: Eric Chafe (born 1946) is an American musicologist specializing in the music of Claudio Monteverdi, Heinrich Biber, Johann Sebastian Bach and Richard Wagner. Chafe holds a PhD in musicology from the University of Toronto. He teaches at Brandeis University, near Boston. == Bibliography == * * Tonal Allegory in the Vocal Music of J.S.
